description: Enterprise techniques used by LunarLoader, ATT&CK software S1143 (v1.0)
name: LunarLoader (S1143)

techniques.comment: [LunarLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1143) can deobfuscate files containing the next stages in the infection chain.(Citation: ESET Turla Lunar toolset May 2024)

[LunarLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1143) can use the DNS domain name of a compromised host to create a decryption key to ensure a malicious payload can only execute against the intended targets.(Citation: ESET Turla Lunar toolset May 2024)
[LunarLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1143) has the ability to use Microsoft Outlook add-ins to establish persistence. (Citation: ESET Turla Lunar toolset May 2024)
[LunarLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1143) can use reflective loading to decrypt and run malicious executables in a new thread.(Citation: ESET Turla Lunar toolset May 2024)
[LunarLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1143) can verify the targeted host's DNS name which is then used in the creation of a decyrption key.(Citation: ESET Turla Lunar toolset May 2024)
